title: Patriots A Nation under Fire-HT
description:
Patriots A Nation under Fire-HT

Developer	4D Rulers
Publisher	SilverLine Software
Release date	2007
Genre   	FPS


Patriots: A Nation Under Fire is a computer game created by 4D Rulers and published by SilverLine Software. It posits the player in the position of a United States Army National Guard soldier whose purpose is to defend the United States of America from a terrorist invasion. An unofficial patch was released by Softopedia. The patch balances the notorious difficulty and adds the level 4 files to the game.

Unoficcal Patch:http://games.softpedia.com/get/Patch/Patriots-A-Nation-under-Fire-Unofficial-Patch.shtml

Minimum System Requirements
OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP
Processor: Pentium 3 @ 850 MHz
Memory: 256 MB
Hard Drive: 1 GB Free
Video Memory: 64 MB (nVidia GeForce 3/ATI Radeon 8500)
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
DirectX: 8.1b
Keyboard & Mouse
CD/DVD Rom Drive
